entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Non-nullable form parameters should be marked `required` in the generated OpenAPI #57112
  • [Blazor] Some of the default UI styling is not accessible in dark mode #57111
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes #57110
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, json_middleware #57109
  • Unable to build and run aspnetcore unit tests on RHEL 8/arm64 #57104
  • Better integration between ASP.NET Core auth handlers and Blazor Server / Wasm #57103
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Auto render mode - can not write cookie inside controller #57102
  • [Blazor] Monaco Editor breaks when navigating back and forth with per page rendermode #57100
  • Idea: Blazor inline component #57099
    Backlog
  • connection Abort + Dispose crashes process #57098
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_dapper #57093

Closed

  • Consumes attribute/filter in controller-based web app does not set MIME type with the value specified #57090
  • [Https] `dotnet dev-certs --trust` support on Linux #32842
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #57094
  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring #57089
  • RequestStream’s `Flush` should not throw #57064
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24366.3] .NET 8 Blazor Web App(WebAssembly) get an error: "TypeError: ar.monoStringToStringUnsafe is not a function" when are running with .NET 9 #56846
  • services.AddSession throws System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException #57097
  • Perf regression: fortunes #57075
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57088
  • SignalR Streaming Channel cancellation issue #57051
  • [9.0-preview7] Response schema being returned as IResult #56975
    9.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • [8.0] Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #57108
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix AzDO area path for policy violations reporting #57105
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add client span to SignalR .NET client #57101
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Try to reduce IIS test event log flakiness #57028
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Add remarks to FromBodyAttrbiute #56997
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-rc1
  • Optimize new use of Base64Url #57050
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Make Stream.Flush no-op on read-only streams #57079
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • [release/2.1] Create tsaoptions.json #57106
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Fixes for OpenAPI document generation with M.E.ApiDescription.Server #57096
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, feature-openapi, 9.0-rc1
  • Fix up handling for awaitable IResults in ApiExplorer #57068
    area-mvc, 9.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9ff2450` to `5bcb2d7` #56999
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Add some HPackDecoderTests for empty header names and values #57032
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Restrict permissions to the dev cert directory #56985
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add Blazor Web Endpoints to the endpoint data source #57086
    area-blazor
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Upgrade yarn dependencies #57092
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix up nullability and form schema handling in OpenAPI #56957
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to specify custom OpenAPI output file name like Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Cli #56974
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Propagate trace parent to SignalR hub invocations #57049
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.IO.Redist dependency #57006
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
